title: What is Snapdragon Satellite? Everything you need to know

description: For everything the smartwatch could do, it could barely last through the day.

title: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is king of the hill, but the small S23 has my heart

title: I really miss phones with pop-up selfie cameras

title: Does ChatGPT save your data? Here’s what you need to know
description: ChatGPT keeps a record of everything you tell it, but is that a problem?
